channel.title: Archangel
channel.description: Matthew York took the sniper skills he honed in the deserts to the streets of a city corrupted by supernatural evil. His decision would have consequences that even he couldn't imagine as chunks of his life are obliterated by the powerful forces he now confronts. Unexpected allies, from organized crime to the very police force hunting him, come to his aid in the conflict. Will they have what it takes to combat the demonic beings behind the scenes? And if so at what cost?
channel.itunes:author: Scott Roche
channel.itunes:subtitle: Supernatural Thriller by Scott Roche
channel.itunes:summary: Matthew York took the sniper skills he honed in the deserts to the streets of a city corrupted by supernatural evil. His decision would have consequences that even he couldn't imagine as chunks of his life are obliterated by the powerful forces he now confronts. Unexpected allies, from organized crime to the very police force hunting him, come to his aid in the conflict. Will they have what it takes to combat the demonic beings behind the scenes? And if so at what cost?

item.title: iTunes Issues
item.dc:creator: scott@archangelnovel.com (Scott Roche)
item.description: For some reason, unknown to me, iTunes took down my feed. To subscribe in iTunes, you’ll need to use this link – http://feeds.feedburner.com/Archangel. If you click on Advanced and Subscribe to Podcast, just past that link in there and you’ll get all the episodes. Thanks for your patience. The final episode [...]
item.content:encoded: For some reason, unknown to me, iTunes took down my feed. To subscribe in iTunes, you’ll need to use this link – http://feeds.feedburner.com/Archangel. If you click on Advanced and Subscribe to Podcast, just past that link in there and you’ll get all the episodes. Thanks for your patience. The final episode is coming very soon!

item.title: Public Critique
item.dc:creator: scott@archangelnovel.com (Scott Roche)
item.description: I asked a question on Twitter last week, the gist of which was, “why do I only see praise for podcast novels in the public stream. It generated quite a brisk conversation. I decided to create an audio response to the feedback. I hope you enjoy it! Shows/People referenced: Braindouche Zach Ricks Brand Gamblin Dan Rabarts Rich Asplund [...]
item.content:encoded:
I asked a question on Twitter last week, the gist of which was, “why do I only see praise for podcast novels in the public stream. It generated quite a brisk conversation. I decided to create an audio response to the feedback. I hope you enjoy it!

Shows/People referenced:

Braindouche
Zach Ricks
Brand Gamblin
Dan Rabarts
Rich Asplund Jr
ObiOrion
Pip Ballantine
Tee Morris
Rick Castello
Michael Falkner
Marnen Laibow-Koser
Dan Absalonson
Alasdair Stuart
Steve Eley
Nathan Lowell

Blogs mentioned:
Why Michell Plested cares about critiques and feedback.
Why Odin One-Eye reviews podcasts.
Svallie’s take on reviewer’s ethics.
item.itunes:subtitle: I asked a question on Twitter last week, the gist of which was, “why do I only see praise for podcast novels in the public stream. It generated quite a brisk conversation. I decided to create an audio response to the feedback. I hope you enjoy it! S

item.title: Personal Effects: Dark Art
item.dc:creator: scott@archangelnovel.com (Scott Roche)
item.description: Leave it to JC Hutchins, author of the podcast (soon to be dead tree) novel 7th Son, to continue not only to bend genres and mutilate the traditional publishing rules but to be involved in something as cool as the transmedia event that is Personal Effects: Dark Arts. What is it? Well watch [...]
item.content:encoded:
Leave it to JC Hutchins, author of the podcast (soon to be dead tree) novel 7th Son, to continue not only to bend genres and mutilate the traditional publishing rules but to be involved in something as cool as the transmedia event that is Personal Effects: Dark Arts. What is it? Well watch the cool video blurb aka vlurb below:

It’s on sale today and you should get it. Go to his online launch party for details and a chance or twelve to win a free book.
item.itunes:subtitle: Leave it to JC Hutchins, author of the podcast (soon to be dead tree) novel 7th Son, to continue not only to bend genres and mutilate the traditional publishing rules but to be involved in something as cool as the transmedia event that is Personal Effects

Leave me a review on iTunes!!

Sidfaiwu

item.title: Power in the Blood
item.dc:creator: scott@archangelnovel.com (Scott Roche)
item.description: Hi, I’m interrupting the regular feed of Archangel to present a little Audio Drama adaptation of Power in the Blood, a short story I wrote quite a while back, I intended to drop this in the feed for Halloween. Heck I’ve really been working on this since before Legion premiered. I hope [...]
item.content:encoded:
Hi, I’m interrupting the regular feed of Archangel to present a little Audio Drama adaptation of Power in the Blood, a short story I wrote quite a while back, I intended to drop this in the feed for Halloween. Heck I’ve really been working on this since before Legion premiered. I hope you enjoy it!

Starring:
George Walk as Reggie Stevens
Billy Flynn as Don Jackson
Terri Vernon as Sister Fran Dockery
Dave Avilla as Jack Wilkes
C. Alexandra Schwarz as Lisa Taylor
Jen Avila as Dorris Stevens and Sister Mary Louise
Taylor Kent as Father Tim Ryan
Indiana Jim as Coach Feaney
Ed Parrot as Neal
Scott Roche as Joel and drug dealer

Music in this podcast thanks to:
Sidfaiwu
The Tudor Consort

Sounds provided by:
The Freesound Project

item.title: Mixer Fund Drive
item.dc:creator: scott@archangelnovel.com (Scott Roche)
item.description:
Okay this is a semi-serious request. I have hit the limits of my equipment and in an effort to bring you guys a better quality podcast I am going to be purchasing some better recording equipment for Archangel/Spiritual Stew. Per some recommendations I have my eyes on these two things:
Behringer Xenyx 802
Behringer U-CONTROL UCA202 USB-Audio [...]
item.content:encoded:
Okay this is a semi-serious request. I have hit the limits of my equipment and in an effort to bring you guys a better quality podcast I am going to be purchasing some better recording equipment for Archangel/Spiritual Stew.

Per some recommendations I have my eyes on these two things:


Behringer Xenyx 802


Behringer U-CONTROL UCA202 USB-Audio Interface

The total price on these puppies is $75 and would dramatically improve the overall quality of all my audio productions. If you’ve enjoyed Archangel and would like to contribute a few bucks it would be much appreciated. Click on the donate button below to give via paypal. Thanks in advance!

item.title: NWO/Archangel Promo
item.dc:creator: scott@archangelnovel.com (Scott Roche)
item.description:
This is a little cross promotion promo between Archangel and New World Orders. It mentions a few podcasts and posits an answer as to what podcast characters may do in their down time. Authors mentioned (and well worth checking out):
Chris Lester Seth Harwood J.C. Hutchins Scott Sigler
item.content:encoded:
This is a little cross promotion promo between Archangel and New World Orders.

It mentions a few podcasts and posits an answer as to what podcast characters may do in their down time. Authors mentioned (and well worth checking out):

  • Chris Lester
  • Seth Harwood
  • J.C. Hutchins
  • Scott Sigler

item.title: Archangel Review by Trucker Rich
item.dc:creator: scott@archangelnovel.com (Scott Roche)
item.description: Trucker Rich was kind enough to review Archangel and had some great words to say. Go check it out! The brother reviews a metric keister load of podcasts and is what I would consider something of an uber-fan when it comes to podcasts and podiobooks. Check out his blog!
item.content:encoded:
Trucker Rich was kind enough to review Archangel and had some great words to say. Go check it out!

The brother reviews a metric keister load of podcasts and is what I would consider something of an uber-fan when it comes to podcasts and podiobooks. Check out his blog!

item.title: New and Notable
item.dc:creator: scott@archangelnovel.com (Scott Roche)
item.description: I’m in the New and Notable section of iTunes on page four. This is a good thing!!! Keep letting people know and get me some more reviews on iTunes. If you like Archangel and haven’t blogged about it, left me a review, or otherwise spread the word, now is a good time!

No promo this time but stay tuned for a plea for help from Chris, from the Adult Space Child Free Podcast. She’s looking [...]
item.content:encoded:
Episode 7 has Matt and Jose making their plans and Sanders hot on the trail of Robin. The tension continues to mount.

Story so far by Dave of The Jaded Visalian podcast.

No promo this time but stay tuned for a plea for help from Chris, from the Adult Space Child Free Podcast. She’s looking for a treatment program for chronic fatigue. ht to JT for the audio file.

Call 206-888-4760 to leave me a message about Archangel!


Leave me a review on iTunes!!

Music in this episode from ADRAW

item.title: Archangel Hotline
item.dc:creator: scott@archangelnovel.com (Scott Roche)
item.description: Call 206-888-4760 to leave me a message about Archangel. So long as it’s on topic and decent quality I’ll include it in my next episode. This is not a toll free number.
item.content:encoded: Call 206-888-4760 to leave me a message about Archangel. So long as it’s on topic and decent quality I’ll include it in my next episode. This is not a toll free number.

item.title: Archangel: Valley of the Shadow Ep. 6
item.dc:creator: scott@archangelnovel.com (Scott Roche)
item.description:
Finally we have Episode 6. What will Sanders do? Sorry for the delay folks. Hope you enjoy it. Stick around for a promo for The Takeover!
Leave me a review on iTunes!!

item.title: Archangel: Valley of the Shadow Ep. 4
item.dc:creator: scott@archangelnovel.com (Scott Roche)
item.description: What does Matt do now? Will he turn himself in? Who is this Sanders character? Will you find out the answers this week? I’ll never tell. You have to listen. I now present Episode 4 of Archangel: Valley of the Shadow of Death. Listen and let me know what you [...]
item.content:encoded:
What does Matt do now? Will he turn himself in? Who is this Sanders character? Will you find out the answers this week? I’ll never tell. You have to listen.

I now present Episode 4 of Archangel: Valley of the Shadow of Death. Listen and let me know what you think.

Referenced in the intro:

The Voice of Free Planet X
Jared Axelrod Interview

Promo for this week:
Chasing the Bard


Leave me a review on iTunes!!

Music in this episode from ADRAW

Hope you enjoy!

item.description:
And so finally, after many moons of hemming and hawing, I now present Episode 1 of Archangel: Valley of the Shadow. Listen and let me know what you think. Referenced in this podcast: 7th Son The Rookie Billibub Battings The Heaven Series The Metamor City Podcast Music in this episode from ADRAW Thanks to the Free Sound Project for the gunshot.

item.content:encoded:
And so finally, after many moons of hemming and hawing, I now present Episode 1 of Archangel: Valley of the Shadow. Listen and let me know what you think.

Referenced in this podcast:

7th Son
The Rookie
Billibub Battings
The Heaven Series
The Metamor City Podcast

Music in this episode from ADRAW
Thanks to the Free Sound Project for the gunshot.


Leave me a review on iTunes!!

Hope you enjoy!
